languages.text: Пока {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Адептус Механикус{/g} вел горячие споры о том, совершил ли он грех изобретения, Бартоломеус бесследно исчез, оставив единственное послание: "Я собрал сокровища с сотен миров, но не видать их алчным владыкам Простора. Я завещаю свои богатства тому, для кого сияние звезд дороже блеска рубинов и злата". Похоже, этим человеком оказались вы.

While the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} were still hotly debating whether or not he had committed the crime of invention, Bartholomeus disappeared without a trace, leaving only a single message: "I have gathered treasures from hundreds of worlds, but they will not be handed over to the covetous lords of the Expanse. Instead, I bequeath my riches to one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than any gold or rubies." It seems that you happen to be this very person.
languages.original_text: Пока {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Адептус Механикус{/g} вел горячие споры о том, совершил ли он грех изобретения, Бартоломеус бесследно исчез, оставив единственное послание: "Я собрал сокровища с сотен миров, но не видать их алчным владыкам Простора. Я завещаю свои богатства тому, для кого сияние звезд дороже блеска рубинов и злата". Похоже, этим человеком оказались вы.

traits.locale_text: While Adeptus Mechanicus were hotly debating whether he had committed the sin of invention, Bartholomeus disappeared without a trace, leaving a single message: "I have gathered treasures from hundreds of worlds, but they will be denied to the covetous lords of the Expanse. I bequeath my riches to the one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than gold and rubies." It looks like you happen to be this person.

I bequeath my riches to the one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than gold and rubies." It looks like you happen to be this person.

Instead, I bequeath my riches to one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than any gold or rubies." It seems that you happen to be this very person.

Instead, I bequeath my riches to one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than any gold or rubies." It seems that you happen to be this very person.

languages.text: Während der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} noch debattierte, ob er sich des Verbrechens der Erfindung schuldig gemacht hatte oder nicht, verschwand Bartholomeus spurlos und ließ nur eine einzige Nachricht zurück: "Ich habe Schätze aus Hunderten von Welten angehäuft, aber sie werden nicht in die Hände der begehrlichen Lords der Ausdehnung gelangen. Stattdessen hinterlasse ich meine Reichtümer jemandem, der den Schein der Sterne mehr schätzt als Gold oder Rubine." Offenbar scheinst du diese Person zu sein.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} were still hotly debating whether or not he had committed the crime of invention, Bartholomeus disappeared without a trace, leaving only a single message: "I have gathered treasures from hundreds of worlds, but they will not be handed over to the covetous lords of the Expanse. Instead, I bequeath my riches to one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than any gold or rubies." It seems that you happen to be this very person.

traits.locale_text: Während der Adeptus Mechanicus noch debattierte, ob er sich des Verbrechens der Erfindung schuldig gemacht hatte oder nicht, verschwand Bartholomeus spurlos und ließ nur eine einzige Nachricht zurück: "Ich habe Schätze aus Hunderten von Welten angehäuft, aber sie werden nicht in die Hände der begehrlichen Lords der Ausdehnung gelangen. Stattdessen hinterlasse ich meine Reichtümer jemandem, der den Schein der Sterne mehr schätzt als Gold oder Rubine." Offenbar scheinst du diese Person zu sein.

languages.text: Alors que l'Adeptus Mechanicus se demandait encore s'il avait commis ou non le crime d'invention, Bartholomeus a disparu sans laisser de trace, ne laissant derrière lui que ce message : « J'ai amassé les trésors de centaines de mondes, mais jamais ils ne viendront remplir les poches des seigneurs cupides des Étendues. Je préfère léguer mes richesses à quelqu'un qui chérit l'éclat des étoiles plus que n'importe quel rubis. » Il semblerait que vous soyez la personne qu'il attendait.
languages.original_text: While the Adeptus Mechanicus were still hotly debating whether or not he had committed the crime of invention, Bartholomeus disappeared without a trace, leaving only a single message: "I have gathered treasures from hundreds of worlds, but they will not be handed over to the covetous lords of the Expanse. Instead, I bequeath my riches to one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than any gold or rubies." It seems that you happen to be this very person.

traits.locale_text: Alors que l'Adeptus Mechanicus se demandait encore s'il avait commis ou non le crime d'invention, Bartholomeus a disparu sans laisser de trace, ne laissant derrière lui que ce message : « J'ai amassé les trésors de centaines de mondes, mais jamais ils ne viendront remplir les poches des seigneurs cupides des Étendues. Je préfère léguer mes richesses à quelqu'un qui chérit l'éclat des étoiles plus que n'importe quel rubis. » Il semblerait que vous soyez la personne qu'il attendait.

Alors que l'Adeptus Mechanicus se demandait encore s'il avait commis ou non le crime d'invention, Bartholomeus a disparu sans laisser de trace, ne laissant derrière lui que ce message : « J'ai amassé les trésors de centaines de mondes, mais jamais ils ne viendront remplir les poches des seigneurs cupides des Étendues. Je préfère léguer mes richesses à quelqu'un qui chérit l'éclat des étoiles plus que n'importe quel rubis. » Il semblerait que vous soyez la personne qu'il attendait.

languages.text: Mientras el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} seguía debatiendo si era o no culpable de un delito de invención, Bartholomeus desapareció sin dejar más rastro que un mensaje: «He reunido tesoros de cientos de mundos, pero no los entregaré a los codiciosos señores de la Extensión. En vez de eso, lo lego a quien valore más el brillo de las estrellas que el del oro y los rubíes». Parece que has resultado ser tú.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} were still hotly debating whether or not he had committed the crime of invention, Bartholomeus disappeared without a trace, leaving only a single message: "I have gathered treasures from hundreds of worlds, but they will not be handed over to the covetous lords of the Expanse. Instead, I bequeath my riches to one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than any gold or rubies." It seems that you happen to be this very person.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el Adeptus Mechanicus seguía debatiendo si era o no culpable de un delito de invención, Bartholomeus desapareció sin dejar más rastro que un mensaje: «He reunido tesoros de cientos de mundos, pero no los entregaré a los codiciosos señores de la Extensión. En vez de eso, lo lego a quien valore más el brillo de las estrellas que el del oro y los rubíes». Parece que has resultado ser tú.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}帝国技術局{/g}の面々が、彼が発明という罪を犯したのかを熱く議論している最中、バルトロメウスはたった1通のメッセージを残して姿を消した。「私は何百もの世界から財宝を集めてきたが、それを貪欲なエクスパンスの領主どもに渡すつもりはない。その代わりに、私は富を、金塊やルビーなどよりも星の輝きを大切にするものに渡そう」と。偶然だが、どうやらあなたがその人物であるようだ。
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} were still hotly debating whether or not he had committed the crime of invention, Bartholomeus disappeared without a trace, leaving only a single message: "I have gathered treasures from hundreds of worlds, but they will not be handed over to the covetous lords of the Expanse. Instead, I bequeath my riches to one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than any gold or rubies." It seems that you happen to be this very person.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局の面々が、彼が発明という罪を犯したのかを熱く議論している最中、バルトロメウスはたった1通のメッセージを残して姿を消した。「私は何百もの世界から財宝を集めてきたが、それを貪欲なエクスパンスの領主どもに渡すつもりはない。その代わりに、私は富を、金塊やルビーなどよりも星の輝きを大切にするものに渡そう」と。偶然だが、どうやらあなたがその人物であるようだ。

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}机械修会{/g}的成员还在激烈地争论巴塞洛缪是否犯下了发明的罪行时，巴塞洛缪早已消失得无影无踪，只留下了一句话。“我这里有从几百个世界收集来的宝藏，但我绝不会把这些宝藏交给科罗努斯扩区贪婪的领主。相反，若是有谁认为群星的光芒比黄金、宝石更加珍贵，那我的财富将归你所有。”看来，这个人指的就是你。
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} were still hotly debating whether or not he had committed the crime of invention, Bartholomeus disappeared without a trace, leaving only a single message: "I have gathered treasures from hundreds of worlds, but they will not be handed over to the covetous lords of the Expanse. Instead, I bequeath my riches to one who cherishes the shine of the stars more than any gold or rubies." It seems that you happen to be this very person.
